body:
Some components are made up of smaller items.

For example, a radio button list (component) contains individual radio buttons (items).

To add an item:

1. Click on 'Properties mode' at the top of the screen
2. Navigate to the page using the links (in the light blue bar)
3. Under 'Components', click on the name of the component you want to add an item to
4. Click ‘Add item’ from the component instance screen
5. On the next screen, choose a unique id for the item
6. Click ‘Set id’
heading: Adding items to components
